channel.title: How do i make a non-wildy a wildy place?
channel.description:
:confused:how do i make a non-wildy a wildy place?? need help on this bad
(note:making varrock my wildy place)

item.title: How do i make a non-wildy a wildy place?
item.dc:creator: @v13tth0rn v13tth0rn
item.description:
@v13tth0rn wrote:

[quote=“hippie, post:3, topic:148800”][quote author=newservermaker link=topic=204042.msg1799380#msg1799380 date=1191486327]
search for wild in client.java, delete all the coords in there exept a little so you know how to change when u want…
[/quote]
Thats really…not beginner freindly.

Try serching

public boolean nonwild(){

in it you will more inlikely see
something like so:

if(absX >=3259  && absX <=3273 && absY >=3407  && absY <=3425 )

more inlikey, it’s a coord plane that covers most of your server.

If you want most of your server wildy, just delete that, and add in cooards of your nonwild places.

here is how you would format it:

absX >=1A && absX <=1B && absY >=2A && absY <=2B

1a: southwest X cooard of your nonwild area
1b: NorthEast X cooard of your nonwild area

2A southwest Y cooard
2B NORTH EAST Y cooard

it would look like so:

---------1B + 2B
| |
| |

1A+2A

Hope i helped[/quote]

wow thankyou alot ! ty again

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a non-wildy a wildy place?

item.title: How do i make a non-wildy a wildy place?
item.dc:creator: @hippie hippie
item.description:
@hippie wrote:

newservermaker:

search for wild in client.java, delete all the coords in there exept a little so you know how to change when u want…

Thats really…not beginner freindly.

Try serching

public boolean nonwild(){

in it you will more inlikely see
something like so:

if(absX >=3259  && absX <=3273 && absY >=3407  && absY <=3425 )

more inlikey, it’s a coord plane that covers most of your server.

If you want most of your server wildy, just delete that, and add in cooards of your nonwild places.

here is how you would format it:

absX >=1A && absX <=1B && absY >=2A && absY <=2B

1a: southwest X cooard of your nonwild area
1b: NorthEast X cooard of your nonwild area

2A southwest Y cooard
2B NORTH EAST Y cooard

it would look like so:

---------1B + 2B
| |
| |

1A+2A

Hope i helped
